document_data.name: Flamewater Fountain
document_data.mainbody: The '''Flamewater Fountain''' was a popular landmark fountain in [[Athkatla]]'s [[Athkatla/Gem District|Gem District]].
document_data.Location: The Flamewater Fountain stood in the chaotic and resplendent westerly part of the Gem District, to the northwest of [[Jalasra Fourwynds]]'s manse in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and to the north of the [[Shadowgates House]].
document_data.History: By the late 14{{th}} century DR, the Flamewater Fountain had become a beloved meeting place of the Athkatla's wealthy inhabitants. The plaza surrounding the fountain was often swarmed by [[perfume]] peddlers and [[makeup]] "touchover lasses."
